mapper.insert: insert into user_collection_sheet (id, user_id, sheet_id, sheet_title, sheet_image) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sheetId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sheetTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sheetImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, user_id, sheet_id, sheet_title, sheet_image from user_collection_sheet
